Author: etherealaqua
Text: In the kindest way, obviously some part of you does want to recover. Some part of you wants the relief of having the control your eating disorder has over you stripped away and being able to eat normal amounts again while in the hospital. Some part of you wants a respite from the hold your eating disorder has on you. Thereâ€™s no shame in wanting recovery, in wanting something better than this horrible disorder. Neither your doctor nor your parents will think so. Hold on to that part of you that wants something different and ask for what you need ðŸ’“
